title: JNU Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Project Research Scientist Post
description: Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU) has declared the offcial notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Research Scientist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post-Graduation can grab this chance and apply for the JNU Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
